originalText.text: AlightPro is like a scam company. Their instructors are really knowledgeable and kind And they really want you to succeed but the Admin is terrible. Initially before you enroll they make lots of promises on how they can work with you to build a resume/interview prep and all. After the classes are over, they stop responding to your calls or emails and render all your months of training worthless. Training that you could easily pay $20 bucks and get on Udemy, they charge you $800 and drag it for months. Only for you to be disappointed at the end. No one deserves such kind of disappointment!

originalText.text: My experience with Alightpro was really good they have professional trainers in every technology especially data analysis and cloud computing and Support team is very interactive and quick. I am happy with the friendly behavior and straight response to the findings. Sometimes, they reply late due to high volume apart from that they are well supportive

originalText.text: My experience with Alightpro about Python is much impressed with the quality of the training. We get access to each day class recorded sessions after the live class. Training team follow-up was good arranging the sessions on time. They can provide course materials, which is really helpful. I must thank Alightpro for giving such support. Thank you guys.

originalText.text:
SAP Abap Training Instructor "Anil" is knowledgeable and have lots of hands on experience on development which was very helpful for the training and he will help a lot to respond to questions while practicing after the training.

AlightPro "Rohan" provided lot of Support post training for the Mock interviews, Resume preparation and IT Support. Rohan is very prompt on answering questions for the post training support.

originalText.text: I am thankful to the faculty who have taught me the QA & Selenium course. The instructors helped me in understanding all the concepts and I got a good job with a high salary.
